name: Colony Elementary School
description: Public elementary school serving students in Pre-K through 5th grade. Part of the Laurel County School District, this school provides comprehensive elementary education with 372 students and a student-teacher ratio of 16:1. The school offers breakfast and lunch programs, and serves the Colony community in London, Kentucky. Led by Principal Kyle Mink, the school focuses on academic excellence and community engagement.
source: Verified from official school website and National Center for Education Statistics
hours_of_operation: Monday-Friday 8:00 AM-3:00 PM (School hours may vary)
eligibility: Students in Pre-K through 5th grade residing in the Colony Elementary attendance zone
services: Elementary education, Pre-K program, breakfast and lunch programs, special education services, school supplies assistance, parent portal access
notes: School has a Facebook page for community updates and communication. Provides comprehensive elementary education with focus on reading and math proficiency.
